data.name: Filter the FromSoftware Bosses by Game
data.description:
Here is a dictionary containing FromSoftware bosses as keys and their respective game titles as values:

```js
{
"Margit, the Fell Omen": "Elden Ring",
"Mohg, Lord of Blood": "Elden Ring",
"Malenia, Blade of Miquella": "Elden Ring",
"Dragonslayer Armor": "Dark Souls 3",
"Soul of Cinder": "Dark Souls 3",
"Pontiff Sulvayn": "Dark Souls 3"
"Ornstein & Smough": "Dark Souls",
"Asylum Demon": "Dark Souls",
"Bed of Chaos": "Dark Souls"
}
```

Create a function that takes a FromSoftware game title as a string argument, and returns an array of all the BOSS NAMES that are from that specific game.

For example, passing the argument "Elden Ring" into the function should return:


["Margit, the Fell Omen", "Mohg, Lord of Blood", "Malenia, Blade of Miquella"]
